New Records: Mitch Marsh scored 177 not out from 132 deliveries, helping Australia defeat Bangladesh by eight wickets in Pune.
Key Match Events: Mitch Marsh's unbeaten century helped Australia win the match by eight wickets
Australia defeated Bangladesh by eight wickets in Pune
Pre-Game Insights: Mitch Marsh felt the knock was a fitting way to celebrate the life of his late grandfather.
Post-Match Reflections: Marsh sounded almost embarrassed about ending up with the player-of-the-match award after earlier conceding 48 runs off his four overs with the ball
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marsh's knock included nine sixes and 17 fours
Australia will go into the World Cup semi-finals on the back of seven straight wins
